content:
Craft an item of type: oak_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "apple", "quantity": 47, "index": 11}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 13}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 36, "index": 32}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 37}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft oak stairs, I need to place oak planks in the top row of the crafting table. The first slot in the top row is slot 1, and therefore I will move 1 oak plank from slot 37 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "apple", "quantity": 47, "index": 11}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 13}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 36, "index": 32}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 37}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: Next, I need to place another oak plank to the right of the one already placed. This corresponds to slot 4, and therefore I will move 1 oak plank from slot 37 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "apple", "quantity": 47, "index": 11}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 13}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 36, "index": 32}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 37}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: Next, I need to place another oak plank to the right of the two already placed. This corresponds to slot 5, and therefore I will move 1 oak plank from slot 37 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "apple", "quantity": 47, "index": 11}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 13}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 36, "index": 32}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 37}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: Next, I need to place another oak plank in the bottom left corner of the crafting table. This corresponds to slot 7, and therefore I will move 1 oak plank from slot 37 to slot 7.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 7 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "apple", "quantity": 47, "index": 11}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 13}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 36, "index": 32}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 37}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: Next, I need to place another oak plank to the right of the one just placed. This corresponds to slot 8, and therefore I will move 1 oak plank from slot 37 to slot 8.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 8 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "apple", "quantity": 47, "index": 11}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 13}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 36, "index": 32}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: Finally, I need to place the last oak plank to the right of the one just placed. This corresponds to slot 9, and therefore I will move 1 oak plank from slot 37 to slot 9.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 9 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "oak_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 9}, {"type": "apple", "quantity": 47, "index": 11}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 18, "index": 13}, {"type": "blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 36, "index": 32}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that the oak stairs have been crafted, I can move them from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
